value.name: Killing of Samuel Luiz - Wikipedia
value.snippet: Samuel Luiz Muñiz, a 24-year-old nursing assistant, was beaten to death in A Coruña, Galicia, Spain, on 3 July 2021. According to several witnesses, including the victim's friends, the crime was motivated by homophobia, which led to country-wide demonstrations in his memory, and in defence of LGBT community.

value.name: Killing of Samuel Luiz - Simple English Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
value.snippet: Samuel Luiz Muñiz was a nursing assistant, who was beaten to death in A Coruña, Galicia, Spain, on 3 July 2021 as a victim of homophobic violence. [1] Samuel Luiz was talking to his friend, Vanessa Gonzalez, when he was attacked at about 2:45 am. [2] After his death, people started doing demonstrations to protest violence against LGBT people. [3]

value.name: What happened to Samuel Luiz in Spain? | The US Sun
value.snippet: What happened to Samuel Luiz in Spain? Luiz was beaten to the point of death in the early hours of July 3, 2021, in A Coruña, Galicia. Witnesses say the attack was allegedly motivated by homophobia, as Luiz was a gay man. Luiz, who was a nurse, was leaving the El Andén nightclub when his assailants believed that he was recording them on his phone.

value.name: Zabicie Samuela Luiz - Killing of Samuel Luiz - abcdef.wiki
value.snippet: Samuel Luiz Muñiz, 24-letni asystent pielęgniarski, został pobity na śmierć w A Coruña, Galicja, Hiszpania, 3 lipca 2021 r. Według kilku świadków, w tym przyjaciół ofiary, motywem zbrodni była homofobia, co doprowadziło do ogólnopolskie demonstracje ku jego pamięci oraz w obronie społeczności LGBT .
